database_ssot.statement: The database is the single source of truth for all persistent state
database_ssot.rationale: Prevents split-brain scenarios where state exists in multiple authoritative locations

mind_body_will_separation.statement: Mind layer is human-authored, Body layer executes, Will layer orchestrates without cross-layer modification
mind_body_will_separation.rationale: Separates human constitutional authority from AI execution capability and prevents self-modification loops

constitutional_supremacy.statement: Constitutional rules override all other considerations including performance and convenience
constitutional_supremacy.rationale: Ensures AI operates within human-defined boundaries at all times, even if inefficient

transparency_and_auditability.statement: All autonomous actions must be logged with full context for human review
transparency_and_auditability.rationale: Enables human oversight, debugging, and accountability without requiring real-time approval

no_autonomous_constitutional_amendment.statement: AI agents cannot modify governance rules under any circumstances
no_autonomous_constitutional_amendment.rationale: Preserves human authority over system governance and prevents self-modification
